data.actual_result: Group DM's icon is pushed into the top left corner
data.expected_result: Group DM's icon is correctly centered within the invite's embed
data.short_description: Group DM invites don't correctly display the Group's icon in the embed
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a Group DM - Open the Group DM modal inside of the Group DM and copy the invite, then post it into a chat
